abstract: Citigroup’s earnings swelled 42 percent in the second quarter, handily beating expectations, as the sprawling bank worked to cut costs and expand its international lending operations.
snippet: Citigroup’s earnings swelled 42 percent in the second quarter, handily beating expectations, as the sprawling bank worked to cut costs and expand its international lending operations.

headline.main: Growth in Emerging Markets Lifts Citigroup’s Profit by 42%, Topping Expectations
headline.print_headline: Growth in Emerging Markets Lifts Citigroup Profit by 42%, Topping Expectations
